Name: Idioctopus
About the game: Love Don't Come Easy! Guide brainless lovestruck octopus couples safely to their romantic rendezvous in increasingly deadly date spots. Magical teleports, juicy switches, sticky gates, dastardly timers and more keep the gameplay fresh and exciting through 80 brain straining puzzles. Features 2 brain dead octopi 8 devious features 80 monster mazes of slimy puzzles Romance and danger Multi format
